title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user wants to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction from Player History
AND user has navigated to a player's Player History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Create New" button on Player's Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should be an option in the top-level dropdown
AND clicking "Transactions" option should cause "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons to be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit the third and fourth levels to only Major items
AND "Injured List" should appear as an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 7 day Concussion IL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown

title: Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants the Earliest Reinstatement date calculated correctly on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on a Place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the system will calculate and display Earliest Reinstatement Date as the 8th day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date)

title: Allow Club user to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion IL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion IL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the blue Submit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font in the player's Player History [Code = IL07J, Description = Place on 7-day Concussion IL]
AND player's major league roster status should change to "7-Day Concussion IL"

title: Allow BOC user to reject a place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND grey "Reject" button is available (in view or edit mode)
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reject"
AND all On Save rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 is displayed
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status is reversed
AND pending player history entry is removed

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion IL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in  Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected status
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND item is reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) is displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = IL07J Description = Place on 7-day Concussion IL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status is set to 7-Day Concussion IL

title: As a user I want to receive an error if I'm attempting to place a player on the IL out of season
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the entered placement date falls between the start of spring training and the submitting Org's Last day of season date (including the post season). If not, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."
{0} should be replaced with the start of Spring Training system date.
{1} should be replaced with the player's Club's Last Day of Season system date.
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Error if the player I am attempting to place on the 7 Day Concussion IL has stats from a game played on the Placement Date or after the Placement date if there is a doubleheader exception
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #4.11.1:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.+Place+on+7-Day+Concussion+DL
See Error Messages #63:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion IL transaction for a player
AND player has stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date on the transaction (as shown on stats tab of profile with "Game Logs" selected)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if the player has any stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date
AND the system should check for all stats found on the stats table(hitting, pitching, etc)
AND if stats for a game played on the Placement date and the doubleheader checkbox is not checked, then system should show an error
BUT if the doubleheader checkbox is checked, then the player may have stats from a game that occurred on the same day as the Placement date but not after. 
AND if stats from a game that occurred after the Placement date are found with the checkbox checked, then system should show an error
AND message should be as follows:
Body:"Stats have been found for player on {0}."
AND "{0}" should be replaced with the game date that the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Error if attempting to place a player on the 7-Day Concussion IL too early
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #4.07:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.+Place+on+7-Day+Concussion+DL
See Error Message #59:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit or approve a Place on 7 Day Concussion IL transaction for a player
AND placement date on the transaction is more than 4 days prior to the start of the player's club's season (Club System Dates Screen)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if the entered placement date is more than 4 days prior to the start of their Club's season 
AND if yes, then an error should be shown
AND message should be as follows:
Body: "Player cannot be placed on 7 Day Concussion DL more than {0} days before the start of their Club's season."
AND {0} should be replaced with the system value - currently "4"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: As a BOC user, I want to receive a warning if I attempt to approve a Place on 7 day Concussion IL transaction without the Last Game Date complete
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #4.18.1:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.+Place+on+7-Day+Concussion+DL
See Error Message # 86:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/DL+-+Messages
GIVEN a BOC approver is attempting to approve a Place on 7 Day Concussion IL transaction for a player
AND Last Game Date on the transaction is blank
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if the Last Game Date has been populated
AND if not, then a warning should be shown
Message: "Last Game Date has not been populated for the Player."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has any pending waiver requests on 7 Day Concussion IL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion IL tx for a player
AND selected player has a pending waiver request (Request Bulletin Sent, Result Bulletin NOT yet sent)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: As a user I want the Earliest Reinstatement Date calculated correctly on a 10-Day IL transaction
custom_preconds: Given user is creating a 10-Day IL Transaction for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user enter the placement date field on a Place on 10 -Day IL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the system will calculate and display the proper Earliest Reinstatement Date. 
AND Earliest Reinstatement for a 10-Day IL placement will always be on the 11th Day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date).

title: As a user I want to submit a place on 10-day IL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: Given user has created 10 day-IL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user open 10-day transaction in the status of  "preliminary"
custom_expected:
THEN Submit to BOC button is available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is blue. 
AND Submit button is available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is grey.
AND Clicking Submit will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. 
AND Clicking Submit will run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass).
AND After the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND System reloads the transaction in view mode, and displays a successful submit blue notification. 
AND Once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in Player's Player History: Code = IL10J, Description = Place on 10-day IL
AND From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields [required]
AND Entry appears in green font
AND Once the transaction has successfully been submitted, the system sets the player's pending major league roster status to "10-Day IL"

See Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reject a place on 10-day IL transaction
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in as a BOC and there is a IL Transaction with the status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_steps:
When Clicking "Reject"


See Rejection Updates: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Button Guidelines: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2281404

See Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Approvers see a "Reject" button in grey when they are viewing a transaction (in view or edit mode) in the Submitted to BOC state. 
AND Clicking "Reject" will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages (all covered in previous stories). 
AND Once all On Save rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #78.
AND If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
AND Reverse player's pending Major League Roster status.
AND Remove pending player history entry.
AND Remove any action items that were generated regarding the transaction.

title: As a BOC user I want to approve a place on 10-day IL transaction
custom_preconds: Given a user is logged in as BOC and there is a IL Transaction with a status "Submitted to BOC"
custom_steps: When Click "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN Once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
AND A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved. 
AND Player's Player History Update: Code = IL10J Description = Place on 10-day IL, From Org/Club and to Org/Club fields to be in black font.


See Approval Updates: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Notice of Disposition for a place on 10-day IL transaction
custom_preconds:
Given user has a IL Transaction

cba change, Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL, printing
custom_steps: Click on Print it should open a menu where the user can choose to print a "Notice of Disposition"
custom_expected:
* Users that have permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button on the transaction in view or edit mode. 
*Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
* Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
* The English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
* The Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new Place on 10-Day IL transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user clicks "Create New" button on the Player History widget for all players. 

cba change, Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on 10-Day IL" from the Create New will check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Place on 10-Day IL transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date.
custom_expected:
THEN If a preliminary or rejected place on 10-day IL transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
OR If a submitted transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in View Mode instead of opening a new transaction.
OR If no preliminary, submitted or rejected transaction created within the last 10 days already exists, then the system will load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode. 
AND Transaction should follow the wireframe and data discovery.

custom_preconds:
Given user is creating a IL Transaction for a player  

cba change, Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL, on submit rule
custom_steps:
On player history widget create a transaction for a player that is out of season

custom_expected:
*"The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."

* {1} should be replaced with the player's Club's Last Day of Season system date.
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if attempting to place a player on the 10-Day IL too early
custom_preconds:
Given user is creating a IL Transaction for a player 
AND Select a player from player history create a IL Transaction and set the date 3 days prior to "Club season"
custom_steps: WHEN user Click "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the system will display the error message of "Player cannot be placed on 10 Day IL more than {0} days before the start of their Club's season."
and the system should be replaced with the system value - currently "3".
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

See Business Rule #2.06:

title: As a user, I want to receive an error if the player I am attempting to place on the 10 Day IL has stats from a game played on the Placement Date or from a game played after the Placement date if there is a doubleheader exception
custom_preconds: cba change, Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL, on submit rule
custom_steps:
See Business Rule #2.10: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Error Messages #63: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676


See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning hanILing) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places where onSubmit rules are fired) will check if the player has any stats from a game played on or after the Placement Date. If stats for a game played on the Placement date and the doubleheader checkbox is not checked, then show an error.  
* If the doubleheader checkbox is checked, then the player may have stats from a game that occurred on the same day as the Placement date but not after. If stats from a game that occurred after the Placement date are found, then show an error. 
* The system will check for all stats found on the stats table. 
**Message**
**Body:**"Stats have been found for player on {0}."
* {0} to be replaced with the game date that the system found stats for as "mm/dd/yyyy" 
* Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
* Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 10-Day IL has previously secured waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a MJ-Place on 10 Day IL tx for a player
AND player has any secured waivers (waivers in effect on profile)
AND Injury Date on the IL placement tx is either:
-Before the Waiver Request Date
OR
-Between the Waiver Request Date and the Claim Period Expiration Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Previously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: User wants to create a new 60 Day IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected 60 Day IL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Injured List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 60-Day IL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Place on 60-Day IL" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: Submit a 60 Day IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Place on 60 Day IL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND an entry should be created in green font in players' Player Historyy: Code = IL60J, Description = Place on 60-day IL
AND player's pending major league roster status should be updated to "60-Day IL"

title: Club user receives notification when tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day IL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day IL transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day IL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the I'm attempting to place a player on the IL out of season
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the entered placement date falls between the start of spring training and the submitting Org's Last day of season date (including the post season). If not, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."
{0} should be replaced with the start of Spring Training system date.
{1} should be replaced with the player's Club's Last Day of Season system date.
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User wants to receive error when placing player with submitted waiver request on 60 Day IL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 60 Day IL tx for a player
AND selected player has a submitted waiver request (Request Bulletin not yet sent)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player with a submitted waiver request may not be assigned. The waiver request should be deleted before re-submitting the assignment."
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new Transfer to 10-Day IL transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PlayerÕs History

cba change, Injured list, mj IL - transfer to 10 day IL
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting ÒCreate NewÓ, "Transactions", "Major", "Injured list", ÒPlace on 10-day IL"

See Data Discovery: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2304538

Create New Map: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2304165

See Wireframe: 
http://vpqzii.axshare.com/#p=player_history
http://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_15-day_IL
custom_expected:
* If a preliminary or rejected transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
* If a submitted transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in View Mode instead of opening a new transaction.
* If no preliminary, submitted or rejected transaction created within the last 10 days already exists, then the system will load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode. 
* Transaction should follow the wireframe and data discovery.
*Selecting "Transfer to 10-Day IL" from the Create New will check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Transfer to 10-Day IL transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date.

title: As a user I want the Earliest Reinstatement Date calculated correctly on a transfer to 10-Day IL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, Injured list, mj IL - transfer to 10 day IL

GIVEN the user is creating a transfer to 10-Day IL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN enters or changes the Placement Date on a Transfer to 10-Day IL transaction form
custom_expected:
THEN
-The system will calculate and display the proper Earliest Reinstatement Date. 
-Earliest Reinstatement for a 10-Day IL placement will be on the 11th Day after the initial placement on the IL (NOT the date on the transfer, but the date the player was initially placed on the IL).

title: As a user I want to submit a Transfer to the 10-Day IL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user is attempting to submit a Transfer to 10-Day IL tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user has navigated to the form in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN Submit to BOC button should be available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be blue
AND Submit button should be available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be grey
AND clicking Submit should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND clicking Submit should run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass)
AND after the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"  
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification. Messages #76
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL then their pending MJ Roster Status should be set to to Rehab 10 Day IL
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion IL then the player's pending MJ roster status should be set to to 10 Day IL
AND once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = TR10J, Description = Transfer to 10-Day IL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND when a transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC" an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND if a file is attached to the transaction, that should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND if Comments are populated on the transaction, they should display in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name should open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND  "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: As a BOC user I want to approve or reject a transfer to 10-day IL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, Injured list, mj IL - transfer to 10 day IL

GIVEN that BOC wants to Approve or Reject a Transfer
custom_steps: WHEN BOC is viewing a transaction(in view or edit mode) in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state.
custom_expected:
THEN
   APPROVE:
* BOC Approvers will see an "Approve" button in blue when Transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states.
* Clicking "Approve" will run all required field, formatting, On Submit and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages.
* Once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
* If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode.
* A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved. See Messages #80.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard.
* Update Player's Player History: Code = TR10J Description = Transfer to 10-Day IL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
* If the playerÕs current MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL, then set the player's MJ Roster Status to Rehab 10 Day IL.
* If the player's current MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion IL, then set the player's MJ roster status to 10 Day IL
OR
   REJECT:
* BOC Approvers will see a "Reject" button in grey when they are viewing a transaction in the Submitted to BOC state only.
* Clicking "Reject" will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages (all covered in previous stories).
* Once all On Save rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
* Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #78.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard.
* Reverse player's pending Major League Roster status.
* Remove pending player history entry.
* Remove any action items that were generated regarding the transaction.

title: User wants to create a new Transfer to 60 Day IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Transfer to 60 Day IL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Injured List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Transfer to 60-Day IL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer to 60-Day IL" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants Earliest Reinstatement Date calculated correctly
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Transfer to 60 Day IL" transaction for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the system will calculate and display proper Earliest Reinstatement Date
AND Earliest Reinstatement Date will be on the 61st Day after the initial placement on the IL (NOT the date on the transfer, but the date the player was initially placed on the IL), OR the 61st Day after the start of the Club's Season Start Date, whichever is later

title: BOC user wants to see flag if affected Org is not at or over its Reserve List limit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a submitted "Transfer to 60 Day IL" tx exists for a player
AND affected Org for the tx is not at or over its Reserve List Limit
AND user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN user views submitted transaction form 
OR user views approval item associated with the tx
custom_expected:
THEN flag icon should display on the form itself
AND flag icon should display on associated approval item 
AND clicking flag icon should display popover with error message "Club's reserve list contains less than {Reserve Limit} players."

title: User wants to create a new Rehab Assignment tx for a player from their player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Injured List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Rehabilitation Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Rehabilitation Assignment" IL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND tx should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants Last Rehab Date calculated correctly on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx is loaded, saved, or goes through any state change
custom_expected:
THEN system should correctly calculate Last Rehab Date for the tx
AND Last Rehab Date should be calculated as Assignment Date + Number of Days for Rehab. (Ex: Assignment Date 4/14/16 and # of days = 30, then the Last Rehab Date is 5/13/2016)

title: Club user receives error if player being placed on rehab was at any point on IL for concussion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to initiate a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction for a player
AND selected player has been placed on the IL for a concussion since his latest reinstate from IL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Rehabilitation Assignment" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "Please contact the Office of the Commissioner. Only a BOC user can create a {Rehabilitation Assignment} for a player that has been placed on the Injured List due to a concussion."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the point of entry

AND "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to submit tx with Transfer Date before First Game Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is has initiated a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx for player
AND Transfer Date on the tx is before the First Game Date of assignment Club's season
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "The player can only be placed on a rehab assignment during competition: [insert First Game Date] to [insert Last Playoff Game Date]."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with tx

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history
custom_preconds:

AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Return from Rehab tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Injured List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode

title: Submit a Reinstate from IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Reinstate from IL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful submit blue notification #76
AND players Pending MJ Roster Status should be set to Active
AND an entry should be created in green font in player's Player History: Code = REINS, Description = Reinstate From {Injured List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
{Injured List} should reference the player's latest IL placement (ex: 7-Day Concussion IL etc)
AND approval item should be generated and display on BOC - Major Transactions = Admin's Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should display in Comments column of Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open the Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Type hyperlink will open submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be required to receive approval prior to submitting a Reinstate from IL tx for a player with a concussion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from IL" transaction for a player
AND selected player has been placed on the IL for a concussion since his latest reinstate from IL transaction
custom_steps: When a Club user creates a Reinstate from Injured List transaction
custom_expected:
THEN Rule 10.03 in the provided rules doc will no longer be applied
AND IF the player was ever on the Concussion IL (across all tx on this IL chain), there will be a "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox 
AND This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
AND Existing requirements will remain unchanged:
AND "Received Medical Director Approval" will continue to be required

title: Receive error if entered reinstatement date is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from IL" transaction for a player
AND reinstatement date entered on the form is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date displayed on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The player cannot be reinstated before the earliest reinstatement date."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: Error message if attempting to place player on IL out of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed 7-Day IL transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls outside the season dates for the player's MN league club season dates (First Game of Season through Last Game of Season (or Last playoff date if that's later) on Club System Dates screen)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {Start of Spring training system date} to {Club's last day of season system date}."
AND clicking Back should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: Error message if Last Game Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed 7-Day IL transaction
AND Last Game Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Last Game Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has any pending waiver requests on 7 Day IL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day IL tx for a player
AND selected player has a pending waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: Receive an error if attempting to place player on IL out of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day IL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls outside the season dates for the player's MN league club season dates (First Game of Season through Last Game of Season (or Last playoff date if that's later) on Club System Dates screen)

custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {Start of Spring training system date} to {Club's last day of season system date}."

AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 60-Day IL has previously secured waivers
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #1.02: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2308669
See Error Message #2: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning hanILing) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings
GIVEN a player has Previously Secured waivers
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to submit or approve a place on 60 Day IL(MN) tx for him
AND Injury date on the IL tx is Either:
-Before Waiver Request Date(On waiver bulletin screen)
OR
-Between Request Date and Claim Period Expiration Date(On waiver bulletin screen)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display the following message:
 "Previously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
* {0} to be replaced with the waiver type.
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Club user receives notification when transfer to 60 Day IL tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day IL" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to

custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer to 60-Day IL" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

AND if original Assignment has been extended, system should use New Last Rehab Date from the extension section of the original assignment date

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Reinstate from IL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Injured List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from IL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from IL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from IL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from IL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = REINS Description = Reinstate From {Injured List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's MJ roster status should be set to Active

title: Receive error if placement date is future dated more than 3 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from IL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 3 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 3 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if entered reinstatement date is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from IL" transaction for a player
AND reinstatement date entered on the form is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date displayed on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The player cannot be reinstated before the earliest reinstatement date."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: User wants Max End Date calculated correctly for Rehab Assignment Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the Rehab Assignment widget
AND "Max End Date" column is populated for each player displayed in the widget on load
AND user was NOT returned from rehab and subsequently placed back on rehab with "Continuation of Rehab" as the reason
custom_steps: WHEN user views "Max End Date" column
custom_expected: THEN "Max End Date" should be calculated using 20 days for non-pitchers and 30 days for pitchers from the Original Placement Date

title: Club user wants to view Recertification tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to the Transactions Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertifications" should be a tab on the Transactions Dashboard
AND Clicking on the Recertifications tab should load the Recertification screen
AND Org header filter should NOT be available
AND The "Org" column should NOT display
AND Clubs should only be able to see their own players
AND The columns and layout should match the wire (with the exceptions noted above)
AND The view should be for the current calendar year (not changeable)
AND Primary sort should be by Player Last, Roster First
AND Secondary sort should be by Placement Date
AND Player column should display the player's Last, Roster First and be a clickable hyperlink to the player's player history
AND Attention required (icon) and player columns should be frozen
AND A player should have one row per IL placement (7-Day Concussion IL, 15 Day IL or MJ 60 Day IL) during the season currently being viewed
AND The IL-Type should display the type of IL placement associated with the row (EX: 15-Day)
AND The Placement column should be the Placement Date of the transaction that put the player on the associated IL
AND The "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire)

title: BOC user wants to view Recertification tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to the Transactions Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertifications" should be a tab on the Transactions Dashboard for MJ Transactions Admins
AND clicking on the Recertifications tab should load the Recertification screen
AND "Org" Header filter should be available
AND "All" should be an option as well as all 30 of the Clubs
AND by default the form should display ARI
AND the "Org" column should display
AND columns and layout should match the wire
AND view should be for the current calendar year (not changeable)
AND primary sort should be by Player Last, Roster First
AND secondary sort should be by Placement Date
AND player column should display the player's Last, Roster First and be a clickable hyperlink to the player's player history
AND a player should have one row per IL placement (7-Day Concussion IL, 15 Day IL or MJ 60 Day IL) during the season currently being viewed
AND the IL-Type should display the type of IL placement associated with the row (EX: 15-Day)
AND the Placement column will be the Placement Date of the transaction that put the player on the associated IL
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire)

title: As a user I want to see what Recertifications are due for a player on my Recertifications tab - 10 Day IL
custom_preconds: Injured list, mj - place on 10 day IL, recertification widget, ux-approval-na
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
http://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertification

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Recertification Due" column will be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire). 
* For a 7-Day Concussion IL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 7 days after the placement date. The following will be 7 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 10-Day IL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 10 days after the placement date. The following will be 10 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 60-Day IL placement, there are no recertifications due so the column will remain blank. 
* Each 7 and 10 Day row will always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future. (Ex: If there is a recertification due for a player on the 10 Day IL that is Due on May 1st, the form will display May 1st, as well as a May 11th Recertification due date, but will NOT display a May 21st Recertification due date until it is past May 11th.)

title: As a user I want to receive an email when a player requires a IL Recertification
custom_preconds: cba change, Injured list, email, mj - place on 10 day IL, mj - recertify a player
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
*Note nothing is changing for this story from previously - just ensuring that this functionality still works with the change from a 15-Day IL to a 10-Day IL*

* The system should check nightly to see if any new players require a IL recertification. 
* If not, no action is taken. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Emails" is set to Yes. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for Clubs for the "IL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the player's Org.
* The system also checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for the BOC for the "IL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the BOC.
* The email should show the dates for all recerts that are still due for the player, separated by commas
* The email should follow the below example.

Example: 
From: e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com [mailto:e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 26, 2016 12:52 PM
To: youremail@yourdomain.com
Subject: IL E-Recert

Matthew Holliday IL Recertification due 08/27/2016

title: Club user wants to submit a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user has navigated to the IL recertification date hyperlink on the IL Recertification widget for a player who requires recert
AND club user has opened a past due recert for the player by clicking the link
AND user is attempting to submit a "IL Recertification" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary state in view or edit mode
AND blue "Submit" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND system should run On Submit rules check
AND after the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Approved"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful approve blue notification. Messages #76
AND no entry should be added to the player's player history
AND no notification for "Approved" should be generated since this transaction is auto-approved
AND no approvals item should be generated for this transaction either since this transaction is auto-approved
